full_summary:
### Government Procurement Notice: Spares for Doors and Hatches

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01020319
* **Publication Date**: January 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 6, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **End User**: Department of National Defence

#### Description of Requirements

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit requests for proposals to supply spare parts for doors and hatches. The requirement includes the following items:

* Sprocket wheels with part numbers 8711820-1 M and 8711767-1, in quantities of 12 and 1 respectively
* Chains with part numbers 80-1RCA and 80-1RCA, in quantities of 6 and 1 respectively
* Cylinder assemblies with part numbers 8711866-1, in quantities of 3

The following locations are specified for delivery:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified, and bidders must provide the brand name, model, part number, and National Catalogue Item Identifier (NCAGE) for each proposed product.

#### Important Documents

Please note that the request for proposal documents may be found at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/49cd58c09ccf65693892135e1bed8a00/rfp_w8482-230819_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/9a2782d9ec869b07d5405e95d78d15ea/rfp_w8482-230819_fr.pdf

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

* Katerina Drescher
* Department of National Defence
* Phone: None
* Email: [Katerina.Drescher@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katerina.Drescher@forces.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade
